resources.string: External storage isn\'t available. Please make sure that your device is disconnected from a computer and that your SD card is inserted (if applicable) and restart the app.
Extract music files, please wait a moment...
Copy music pacakge to external storage...
File extract failed, this may be the external storage is not available!
Not enough external storage space(at least need to 40MB), clean up some useless files and try this app again!
Sorry, The ThemeHospital requires at least 800x480 resolution in order to run, your device can not run that game.Should continue to install music data?
